snippet: The Met’s management and the union representing its stagehands reached a contract deal, allowing the company to go ahead with its coming season of performances.
abstract: Metropolitan Opera and union representing its stagehands reach contract deal following marathon bargaining session, clearing last major hurdle before company could go ahead with its coming season; Met drops its threat of lockout following deal.
lead_paragraph: The Met’s management and the union representing its stagehands reached a contract deal, allowing the company to go ahead with its coming season of performances.

headline.main: Metropolitan Opera Clears Last Major Hurdle in Labor Talks
headline.print_headline: Metropolitan Opera Clears Last Major Hurdle in Labor Talks

keywords.value: International Alliance of Theatrical Stage Employees
keywords.name: organizations
